plot: The farcical adventures of two rich mental patients from Argentina who escape to Hollywood to make it in show business. The Tyrants encounter loutish neighbors, predatory real estate people...
plot_en: The farcical adventures of two rich mental patients from Argentina who escape to Hollywood to make it in show business. The Tyrants encounter loutish neighbors, predatory real estate people...

title: Tyrants in Therapy
